user: what are the skills of shlok and which education he is pursuing
bot:
Shlok has the following skills:

Languages: C, C++, Python
Libraries/Tools: Scikit-Learn, NumPy, Pandas, Matplotlib, BeautifulSoup, OpenCV
Concepts: Data Structures and Algorithms (DSA), Object-Oriented Programming (OOP), Web Scraping
Technologies: Python for Data Analysis & Visualization

Shlok is pursuing a B.Tech degree in Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning at SVKM's NMIMS University. He is currently in his 2nd year and is expected to graduate in 2027.
